thread.title: SoftBank Tech Fund Leads $865 Million Investment in Construction Startup

author: Eliot Brown
title: SoftBank Tech Fund Leads $865 Million Investment in Construction Startup

organizations.name: million investment in construction startup softbank group corp.

text:
SoftBank Group Corp. is putting its massive $93 billion tech-investment fund to work in construction.
The Japanese conglomerateâ€™s Vision Fund is leading a group of investors with an $865 million bet on Katerra Inc., a three-year-old Silicon Valley startup that aims to change how housing and commercial buildings are constructed by using an assembly-line-like system to control every aspect of design and production.
